TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed MemoryCacheSection extends System.Configuration.ConfigurationSection

Docs.summary: Defines a configuration section for a cache based on the class. This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The MemoryCacheSection class defines the settings that are available in the `memoryCache` section of a configuration file. In this section, the `namedCaches` element is used to configure a default instance of the cache and to configure any additional named instances.
For more information, see [\<memoryCache> Element (Cache Settings)](../Topic/%3CmemoryCache%3E%20Element%20\(Cache%20Settings\).md).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
Gets the collection of configuration settings for the named instances.
Docs.value: A collection of settings for each named cache.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The NamedCaches property references the collection of configuration settings from one or more `namedCaches` elements of the configuration file. For more information about configuration options that are related to this property, see [\<namedCaches> Element (Cache Settings)](../Topic/%3CnamedCaches%3E%20Element%20\(Cache%20Settings\).md).

Docs.returns: A collection of settings for each named cache.
